review: Great device, works perfectly. I enjoy using HBO GO, screen casting and pandora on this.  I just ordered the Roku stick to compare.  But for $35, you can't lose with the ChromeCast!! More apps and this will DESTROY all other options!
author: Bryan St Clair

review: Pros:Small, easy to use, great video streaming qualityCons: No way external speakers can be attached, only TV speakers work.
author: Abid  Hussain

review: Cann't wait for more support on other applications.  This thing works great on Netflix and my Chrome browser right now....We all love it.
author: firebreather

review: I use it only from Youtube from the laptop and Samsung S4, there are delays sometimes. The setup was a bit frustrating, there is not enough tutorial.
author: Sergio M

review: I had been using a wi-fi enabled Blu-Ray player to stream Netflix and it was frustrating because it would freeze all the time.  I decided to spend the $35 in hopes that wouldn't happen with Chromecast.  WOW is all I have to say.  It works flawlessly.  Simple set up, easy to use.  It showed up as an option for all my other connected devices (iPad, iPhone).  This was well worth the money.  Note - it doesn't work with Amazon instant video, unless you 'cast' from a tab in Chrome but that's not ideal.
author: Karen In PA

review: I prefer the apple tv. I didn't like the Chromecast. Don't be tempted by the price. I think apple has a better product..
author: Pablo D Mascheroni

review: Now that I can stream most content to my TV, I no longer need to watch TV and can finally move away from UK's crazy TV licensing fees (BBC tax). I can also move my TV into my bedroom and stream all my media without having to hook up wires, cables, set-top boxes etc. Love my Chromecast..
author: Roshan Mani

review: It is very easy to hook up as long as you have both HDMI and a USB port. I take the movies off my Toshiba  laptop and transfer to the TV.I record movies with my Nikon camera and play them on TV using Google Chromecast.
author: Kathy Lannom

review: Beats the ROKU Stick with regard to wifi connection.  On the same TV, the Roku stick dropped connection, and the chromecast delivers HD video from netflix.  Just wish it had a remote!
author: GeoTony

review: If you are thinking about buying a Chromecast, you may want to re-consider. I have spent about 8 hours so far trying to install, and get this thing to work with very little success. Even after following all the instructions, reseting the router to factory defaults, following every troubleshooting tip, visiting the message boards, and shorting my life by several hours, I still do not have a functioning Chromecast. It appears as if it's installed correctly (network connection shows up in the lower left corner of the screen). However, I cannot "cast" video to it. No devices show up in the cast window. Search the internet for "Chromecast problems" before you buy. You may get lucky if you buy one, but I wasn't so fortunate.
author: Gregory A. Helton
